email.subject: Your Overseas Vote Voter Account
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

Overseas Vote congratulates you on opening your new Voter Account. This will be the hub of your voting activity. You can login now using the following link: Access My Voter Account

Your Voter Account is the place where you can access all your information you need to register to vote in person or via absentee ballot and will save you a ton of time!

Once you have logged into your Voter Account you will have instant access to:

  • Election dates and deadlines
  • Fact-checked news
  • Contact information for your local election officials
  • A detailed helpdesk and contact who can answer your individual questions
  • Voting history of your congressional officials

...and many more features that make it easy to be an informed and engaged voter. We are excited to have you as a new Voter Account holder.

Please don’t hesitate to contact us with any questions you may have!

From the volunteer team at at Overseas Vote – an initiative of U.S. Vote Foundation
